entries.title: Meta to pay $725 million to settle Cambridge Analytica lawsuit
entries.description: Data harvested by Cambridge Analytica was used for political campaigns.

entries.title: Meta and Alphabet lose dominance over US digital ads market
entries.description: Long-held duopoly that rules the $300 billion market is hit by growing competition.

entries.title: Exxon’s bad reputation got in the way of its industry-wide carbon capture proposal
entries.description: Shell initially resisted the Houston project and believed Chevron had doubts, too.

entries.title: A very special Dealmaster: Last-minute deals you can still grab
entries.description: Dealmaster has discounts on some of our favorite fitness trackers, 4K TVs, and smart home devices.

entries.title: Google vs. Amazon: The smart display showdown
entries.description: Both companies' smart displays often feel pretty dumb.
